name: Dieter Privacy
author: simply Legal GmbH

sections.description:
Dieter Privacy streamlines the integration of GDPR-compliant legal documents into your WordPress website by leveraging the SaaS capabilities of Dieter Privacy Service. This plugin acts as a bridge between your Dieter account and your website, ensuring that the generated privacy declarations are easily and seamlessly displayed to your web visitors.

With a prime focus on compliance and user-friendly experiences, the Dieter Privacy plugin allows you to:
* Generate Legal Documents: Create GDPR-compliant privacy declarations through the Dieter Privacy Service by answering a set of straightforward questions.
* Retrieve with Document ID: Each privacy declaration is associated with a unique Document ID, which can be utilized within your WordPress website through this plugin.
* Display via Shortcodes: Incorporate the generated legal documents effortlessly on any page or post using a shortcode.

Navigating through the complexities of GDPR compliance becomes significantly smoother, as Dieter Privacy ensures that your privacy declarations are not only legally compliant but also easily accessible to your website visitors. Keep your focus on building great content while we handle the intricacies of privacy compliance for you.

Use of external services

The Dieter Privacy plugin relies on the Dieter Privacy Service, a third-party service, to provide GDPR-compliant legal documents. This interaction takes place every time a user requests to retrieve and display privacy policies or other legal documents within their WordPress website using the plugin.
Service details:
* Name: Dieter macht den Datenschutz
* URL: https://www.dieter-datenschutz.de
* Privacy Policy: https://www.dieter-datenschutz.de/datenschutz
* Terms of use: https://app.dieter-datenschutz.de/terms

By using this plugin, you acknowledge and agree that the plugin will communicate with the Dieter Privacy Service to retrieve document content based on the unique document ID you provide. Make sure you have reviewed the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy of the Dieter Privacy Service to understand how your data is handled and the legal implications of using this service in connection with your WordPress site.

Features

  • Seamless Integration with Dieter Privacy Service: Connect your WordPress website with your account on www.dieter-datenschutz.de effortlessly, ensuring that your privacy declarations are created, managed, and displayed with utmost compliance and ease.
  • Generate and Display Legal Documents: Produce GDPR-compliant documents via the Dieter Privacy Service and display them on your WordPress site using a unique Document ID.
  • Shortcode for Easy Embedding: Use a simple shortcode [dieter docid="YOUR_DOCUMENT_ID"] to embed and display your privacy declarations on any page or post, providing flexibility and simplicity in showcasing legal documents to your visitors.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/dieter-privacy directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to the ‘Dieter’ menu in the dashboard to access the features.
sections.faq:
How do I create a GDPR-compliant privacy declaration?

Visit Dieter Privacy Service and create an account. Follow the intuitive process, answering a set of simple questions to generate your personal privacy declaration. Once created, you will be provided with a unique Document ID which can be used with this WordPress plugin.

How do I display the privacy declaration on my WordPress site?

Use the shortcode [dieter docid="YOUR_DOCUMENT_ID"] in your posts or pages to display the privacy declaration. Replace “YOUR_DOCUMENT_ID” with the unique identifier provided by Dieter Privacy Service.

Can I customize the appearance of the privacy declaration on my site?

Yes, the plugin enqueues default styles, but you can override these with custom CSS in your theme to ensure the privacy declaration aligns with your websiteâ€™s aesthetic.

What happens to the legal documents if I uninstall the plugin?

The shortcode will stop working. The legal documents though will still be available in your Dieter account.

Can I use this plugin without a Dieter account?

No, a Dieter account is necessary as it provides the unique Document ID required to retrieve and display your GDPR-compliant privacy declaration on your WordPress site.
